trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Tillhandahåller data för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting"> </xref> händelse.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting> event is raised for each <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> that is visible on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>Händelsen höjs för varje <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>som är synliga på <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellPainting>

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, set the properties in a DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs to change the appearance of the cell instead of directly accessing a cell in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Ange egenskaper för att förbättra prestanda i en DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs att ändra utseendet på cellen i stället för direkt åtkomst till en cell i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If you manually paint the cell, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Om du manuellt formatera cellen i <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you do not set <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to `true`, the cell will paint over your customizations.
trans-unit.target: Om du inte anger <xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>till `true`, cellen kommer paint över dina anpassningar.</xref:System.ComponentModel.HandledEventArgs.Handled%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initierar en ny instans av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs"> </xref> klass.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that contains the cell to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som innehåller cellen återges.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> används för att rita den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som måste vara uppdaterad.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that contains the bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som innehåller gränserna för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som som ritas.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Radindex i cellen som ritas.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Kolumnindexet i den cellen som ritas.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En binär kombination av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> värden som anger tillståndet i cellen.

trans-unit.source: The data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Data för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som som ritas.

trans-unit.source: The formatted data of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Formaterade data av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> som som ritas.

trans-unit.source: An error message that is associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: Ett felmeddelande som är associerad med cellen.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains formatting and style information about the cell.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som innehåller information om cellen formatering och format.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that contains border styles for the cell that is being painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som innehåller kantlinjeformat för cellen som ritas.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: En binär kombination av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> värden som anger delar i paint.

trans-unit.source: dataGridView is .
trans-unit.target: dataGridViewis .

trans-unit.source: -or- graphics is .
trans-unit.target: -or- graphics is .

trans-unit.source: -or- cellStyle is .
trans-unit.target: -or- cellStyle is .

trans-unit.source: paintParts is not a valid bitwise combination of values.
trans-unit.target: paintPartsär inte en giltig bitvis kombination av värden.

trans-unit.source: Gets the border style of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar Kantlinjeformatet för aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Change the borders of the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> by setting the properties of the AdvancedBorderStyle property to one of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> values.
trans-unit.target: Ändra kantlinjer i aktuellt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>genom att ange egenskaper för egenskapen AdvancedBorderStyle till en av de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle>värdena.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedCellBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"></xref> that represents the border style of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyle"> </xref> som representerar Kantlinjeformatet för den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Get the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämta gränserna för aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerar gränserna för aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the cell style of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar cellformatet aktuella <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Change the appearance of the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> by setting the properties of the CellStyle property.
trans-unit.target: Ändra utseendet på aktuellt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>genom att ange egenskaper för egenskapen CellStyle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> that contains the cell style of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> som innehåller cellformatet aktuella <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar del av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som måste vara uppdaterad.

trans-unit.source: The ClipBounds property represents the area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ClipBounds representerar den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>som måste vara uppdaterad.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user covers the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> with another window, and then uncovers it, then ClipBounds represents the entire <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
trans-unit.target: Till exempel om en användare omfattar hela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>med ett annat fönster och sedan upptäcker den, och sedan ClipBounds representerar hela <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: If a user covers a small area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, and then uncovers it, then ClipBounds represents the small area that was covered.
trans-unit.target: Om en användare omfattar en liten del av den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>, och sedan upptäcker den, och sedan ClipBounds representerar litet område som omfattades.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that needs to be repainted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som representerar den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> som måste vara uppdaterad.

trans-unit.source: Gets the column index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar kolumnindex för aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The ColumnIndex property returns -1 when a row header cell is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen ColumnIndex returnerar -1 när en rad rubrikcell ritas.

trans-unit.source: The column index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Kolumnindexet i aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar en sträng som representerar ett felmeddelande för aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When the current <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> is a row header cell, the ErrorText property is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.
trans-unit.target: När aktuellt <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>är en rad rubrikcell egenskapen HeaderText är samma som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: When the current cell is a data cell, ErrorText is the same as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: När den aktiva cellen är en datacell, är HeaderText samma som <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen i <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.ErrorText%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A string that represents an error message for the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: En sträng som representerar ett felmeddelande för aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the formatted value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar det formaterade värdet för aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The FormattedValue property contains the value of the cell after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> property has been applied to it, and after the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> event has been handled.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen FormattedValue innehåller värdet för cellen efter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>eller <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A>egenskap har kopplats till den och efter den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting>händelse har hanterats.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellFormatting> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.FormatProvider%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Format%2A>

trans-unit.source: The formatted value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det formaterade värdet för aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> används för att rita aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> used to paint the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> används för att rita aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Paints the specified parts of the cell for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Återger de angivna delarna i cellen för området i de angivna intervallet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som anger del av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> återges.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to paint.
trans-unit.target: En binär kombination av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> värden som anger delar i paint.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: <>*> är mindre än-1 eller större än eller lika med antalet rader i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontroll. - eller - <> </> *> är mindre än-1 eller större än eller lika med antalet kolumner i den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> kontroll.

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell background for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Återger cellbakgrunden för området i de angivna intervallet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som anger del av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> återges.

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>att rita kantlinjerna bakgrund med färgen för den <> </> *>-egenskapen för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> att rita kantlinjerna bakgrund med färgen för den <> </> *>-egenskapen för den <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.InheritedStyle%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: Paints the cell content for the area in the specified bounds.
trans-unit.target: Återger cellinnehållet för området i de angivna intervallet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that specifies the area of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref> som anger del av den <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> återges.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.RowIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of rows in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control. -or- <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPaintingEventArgs.ColumnIndex*> is less than -1 or greater than or equal to the number of columns in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.

trans-unit.source: The cell parts that are to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Cell-delar som ska återges.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"></xref> values specifying the parts to be painted.
trans-unit.target: En binär kombination av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewPaintParts"> </xref> värden som anger delar återges.

trans-unit.source: Gets the row index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar index för aktuellt raden <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The RowIndex property returns -1 when a column header is being painted.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen RowIndex returnerar -1 när en kolumnrubrik ritas.

trans-unit.source: The row index of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Index för aktuellt raden <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the state of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar tillståndet för aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values that specifies the state of the cell.
trans-unit.target: En binär kombination av <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> värden som anger tillståndet i cellen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hämtar värdet för aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Value property contains the value of the cell before any formatting occurs.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen Value innehåller värdet för cellen innan sker all formatering.

trans-unit.source: The value of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Värdet för aktuellt <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref>.
